alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Dripping Springs; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS POSSIBLE ACROSS GILA...NORTHEAST MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... Conditions are favorable for strong thunderstorms to develop late this afternoon across the high terrain of south-central Arizona. Winds in excess of 50 mph will be possible. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, Globe, Superior, Hayden, Winkelman, Sycamore Creek, Roosevelt, Sunflower, Christmas, Sugarloaf Mountain, Ballantine Trailhead, Round Valley, New River, Cave Creek, San Carlos, Carefree, Miami, and Sawmill. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 215 and 298. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 191 and 229. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 271. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
